about_the_game:
Introduction:

Welcome, enthusiasts of strategy and kingdom management! "World Strategy War" is a strategy game that awaits you to imprint your name in the history books. Build your own kingdom, manage your army, and rise to the pinnacle of competition among kingdoms on different islands.

Game Features:

Diverse Islands to Explore:

Unique challenges and advantages await in cities and resources on different islands.
Star gates for inter-island transitions challenge your strategic mobility.
Royal Families and Successions:

Each state has a king and soldiers from the royal family.
In case of the king's demise, a member of the royal family can ascend, prompting a reassessment of your strategy.
Aging Soldiers and Special Abilities:

Soldiers age and naturally die at different ages if they don't fall in battle.
Each soldier has unique abilities and experiences, shaping your strategy accordingly.
Advanced City Structures:

Build structures like castles, hospitals, forges, mines, and barracks.
Resources from mines, processed by forges, produce powerful weapons and armor.
Economic Management and Tax Policies:

Manage your economy with taxes collected from each city.
Adjust tax levels for increased loyalty and minimized rebellion risks.
Strategic Warfare and City Conquests:

Treat wounded soldiers in hospitals after battles.
Capture prisoners, put them to work in mines, or negotiate ransoms.
Seizing soldiers within castles increases the difficulty of capturing cities.
Diplomacy and Espionage:

Make peace or form alliances with other states through envoys.
Agents can spy on enemy units or carry out assassinations for additional strategic advantages.
In "World Strategy War," employ your intelligence, strategic thinking, and kingdom management skills. Build your own kingdom and become the master of inter-kingdom warfare in this enchanting world of strategy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit işlemci ve işletim sistemi gerektirir
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit işlemci ve işletim sistemi gerektirir

name: World Strategy War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Vista, Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Rule diverse islands, master strategy, prove might in warfare!
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
